Introducing Claude Toolbox – your all-in-one FREE Chrome extension that improves your Claude experience!

Claude Toolbox boosts your productivity, whether you're a casual or using Claude every day. It offers powerful features, including:

📤 Export Claude Conversations: Easily export your Claude chats in TXT or JSON formats. Perfect for saving, sharing, or backing up your conversations.

🔍 FAST Search History: Instantly find recent chat messages or titles with options for exact match or "include" search for broader results.

Why Claude Toolbox is the Ultimate Tool for Claude Users

Claude Toolbox is ideal for users who want better control over their chats. You can 🔍 search your chat history in a few clicks. With Claude Toolbox, you can work faster without losing valuable information.

✨ Key Features of Claude Toolbox

Export Conversations 📤: Easily export your Claude conversations in TXT or JSON formats. Simply select the export button in the top corner next to the start icon and choose your desired format. Perfect for saving, sharing, or using your conversations outside of Claude.

Quick Search 🔍: Say goodbye to endless scrolling! With Claude Toolbox, you can effortlessly search your chat history using keywords, helping you locate exactly what you need in seconds. Choose between an exact match or an "includes" search to find results tailored to your needs. This feature ensures quick and seamless access to your chat history, streamlining your experience with Claude.

Multi-language Support 🌍: Use Claude Toolbox in any language! Claude Toolbox supports many languages, making chat management easier.

Customizable Interface 🎨: Make your workspace your own! Choose between light and dark modes, and enjoy RTL support for right-to-left languages. Personalize your Claude interface for optimal comfort and ease of use.

🔧 How Claude Toolbox Works

Getting started with Claude Toolbox is a breeze:

Install the Claude Toolbox extension from the Chrome Web Store.

Open Claude and explore the new tab in the sidebar.

Export your conversations quickly in either TXT or JSON format with a simple click.

Use the search feature to find specific conversations.

Choose light or dark mode and many languages to personalize your interface.
